title: Yudatte Saikоu! Revice Anime Yukemuri Paradise A Go! Go!

alternative_titles.en: Boiling is the Best! Revice Anime: Steam Paradise A Go! Go!
alternative_titles.ja: ゆだって最高！リバイスアニメ湯けむりパラダイス A GO！GO！

synopsis:
Demons, these are the evil beings dwelling each and every human heart, winning over the body... Anime, this is the magnificent entertainment giving fun to each and every human heart...

(Source: Kamen Rider Wiki)
